name.value: Immunization - XIS Server - Scenario 1.3 - Serve Immunization resources of Lucasz - target GetMedication - JSON Format

description.value: Scenario 1.3 - Serve Immunization resources of van Lucasz
OAuth Token for current patient
Resource.id for Immunization 1
Resource.id for Immunization 2

This variable needs to be filled with the following params. The name (the variable name), sequenceNumber (the index), sourceId (the id of the resource) and as resource Immunization should be filled in
Resource.id for Medication 1

This variable needs to be filled with the following params. The name (the variable name), sequenceNumber (the index), sourceId (the id of the resource) and as resource Immunization should be filled in
Resource.id for Medication 1
Serve Immunization resource including the patient and performer
Test XIS server to serve Immunization resources.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Patient resource(s).
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Organization resource(s).
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 2 Location resource(s).
Confirm that the Bundle contains a(n) Patient with the right birth date

name.value: Test scenario 1.3 - Serve vaccinations - Check Immunization 1

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Immunization that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: imm-Immunization-04-01)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Immunization that contains vaccineCode.coding.code = '74691'
Immunization resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-Vaccination-event'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-Vaccination.PharmaceuticalProduct' with .valueReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'completed'
Contains .vaccineCode with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' and .code '74691' and .display
Contains .patient with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .occurrenceDateTime
Contains .location with either .reference or .identifier and .display

Contains .performer with .function with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and .code 'AP' and .display, and .actor with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).where(id = '${imm-Immunization-04-01-id}').performer.where(function.coding.where(system = 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and code = 'AP' and display) and actor.where((reference or identifier) and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .performer.function with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and .code 'AP' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-9 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .performer.actor with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-9 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .reasonCode with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '159731000146104' and .display

Contains .protocolApplied with .targetDisease with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '6142004' and .display, and .doseNumberString. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).where(id = '${imm-Immunization-04-01-id}').protocolApplied.where(targetDisease.where(coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '6142004' and display)) and doseNumber.ofType(string)).exists()

description.value: Contains .protocolApplied.targetDisease with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '6142004' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-11 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .protocolApplied.doseNumberString. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-11 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert is set to warning because string comparisons can have many possible caveats

Contains .protocolApplied with .targetDisease with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '128241005' and .display, and .doseNumberString. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).where(id = '${imm-Immunization-04-01-id}').protocolApplied.where(targetDisease.where(coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '128241005' and display)) and doseNumber.ofType(string)).exists()

description.value: Contains .protocolApplied.targetDisease with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '128241005' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-12 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .protocolApplied.doseNumberString. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-12 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert is set to warning because string comparisons can have many possible caveats

name.value: Scenario 1.3 - Read Medication resource 1 - Check Medication

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Medication that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: imm-PharmaceuticalProduct-04-01)
Response contains exactly 1 Medication
Medication resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-PharmaceuticalProduct'
Contains .code with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' and .code '74691' and .display
Contains .batch with .lotNumber
